TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class MenuAdapter Inherits WebControlAdapter Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type MenuAdapter = class inherit WebControlAdapter interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 提供方法，可以修改特定瀏覽器的 控制項行為。

span.span: Provides the means to modify the behavior of the control for specific browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A修改的標記或行為部分功能為特定的瀏覽器或瀏覽器，或採取動作的類別做為篩選條件的控制項。A modifies the markup or behavior of a control for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 根據預設，中的物件控制項呈現為超連結，以容納功能表巡覽功能。By default, the objects in the control are rendered as hyperlinks to accommodate menu navigation. 類別會維護狀態，藉由實作介面，讓它可以回應，並在回傳期間引發特定事件。The class maintains state by implementing the interface so that it can respond to and raise specific events during postback. 您可以延伸類別，以進一步自訂轉譯或行為控制項。You can extend the class to further customize rendering or behavior of the control. 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework，才能搜尋控制項，為對應的介面卡的要求的瀏覽器的特性。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 類別會使用瀏覽器定義檔案，來識別用戶端瀏覽器的特性，以及對應至瀏覽器類型的配接器。The class uses browser definition files to identify the characteristics of the client browser and to map the adapter to the browser type. 如需在 ASP.NET 中的自適性轉譯的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information about adaptive rendering in ASP.NET, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework，才能搜尋控制項，為對應的介面卡的要求的瀏覽器的特性。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 控制項配接器發現之後，保留中的對應配接器執行個體的參考其屬性。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

member this.Control : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu

summary.span: 擷取與這個 物件相關聯的 控制項的強型別參考。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 與目前 物件關聯的 控制項。

span.span: The control associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來參考配接器的對應控制項。The property provides a way to reference the adapter's corresponding control. 配接器與特定控制項相關聯時，.NET Framework 會呼叫配接器的位置，或除了控制項的生命週期方法的生命週期方法。When an adapter is associated with a particular control, the .NET Framework will call the life-cycle methods of the adapter in place of or in addition to the life-cycle methods of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以擷取控制項的父類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the control of the parent class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/CS/contosomenuadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/VB/contosomenuadapter.vb#2)]

param.name: state
param.span: 字典格式的 ，包含配置器的狀態資訊。

span.span: An in the form of a dictionary that contains the adapter's state information.

summary.span: 載入於先前要求頁面期間由 方法儲存的任何控制項狀態資訊。

span.span: Loads any control state information that was saved by the method during a previous request to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當配接器需要維持私人狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 若是類別，其中顯示的功能表中的階層是相依於先前所選取物件，`state`提供含有功能表的階層中選取的項目路徑的名稱/值組的字典。In the case of the class, where the displayed menu hierarchy is dependent on the previously selected object, `state` provides a dictionary of name/value pairs containing the path of the selected item in the menu's hierarchy. `state`參數是所儲存的物件先前要求頁面期間。The `state` parameter is a object saved by the during a previous request to the page. 如果控制項未註冊為參與控制項狀態，配接器必須註冊控制項狀態。If the control is not registered to participate in control state, the adapter must register for control state. 除了控制項，與其他的生命週期方法不同的狀態維護配接器控制狀態。Adapter control state is maintained in addition to the state for the control, unlike other life-cycle methods.

related.span: 控制項狀態與檢視狀態範例

span.span: Control State vs. View State Sample

param.name: e
param.span: 與此事件關聯的 資料。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 將關聯的 控制項登錄成需要控制項狀態。

span.span: Registers the associated control as one that requires control state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法註冊為需要控制項狀態的相關聯的控制項。The method registers the associated control as one that requires control state. 根據預設，.NET Framework 會呼叫 Web 伺服器控制項的自己方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the Web server control's own method. 不過之後,的伺服器控制項的屬性設定時，.NET Framework 會呼叫配接器的實作方法，而不是控制項的實作。However, after the property of the server control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用方法來初始化控制項中的設定。Use the method to initialize settings in the control. 在回傳時，這是用於管理現有的檢視狀態資料互動的重要階段。During a postback, this is an important phase for managing interaction with existing view-state data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 如果配接器會覆寫方法，它必須呼叫對應方法的基底類別。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否則，控制項的自己不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own event will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 與此事件關聯的 資料。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 為關聯的 控制項處理 方法。

span.span: Handles the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫的內部`OnPreRender`方法中的類別。The method calls an internal `OnPreRender` method in the class. 父類別，例如資料繫結，套用樣式和事件指派的所有其他預先轉譯函式執行如預期般運作。All other pre-rendering functions of the parent classes, such as data binding, applying styles, and event assignments perform as expected. 根據預設，呼叫.NET Framework控制項的方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the control's method. 不過之後,屬性，該控制項的設定時，.NET Framework 會呼叫配接器的實作方法，而不是控制項的實作。However, after the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用方法，以完成程序在控制項中的任何設定。Use the method to finalize any settings in the control. 控制屬性在這個階段中所做的變更將會儲存檢視狀態，但變更將於方法不會儲存。Changes made to control properties in this phase will be saved to view state, but changes made in the method are not saved. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 如果配接器會覆寫方法，它必須呼叫對應方法的基底類別。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否則，控制項的自己方法就不會引發。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own method will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);
abstract member RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit override this.RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: ，表示目前的節點在功能表階層中的路徑。

span.span: A that represents the path of the current node in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 在引發回傳事件時，用來維護功能表路徑。

span.span: Used to maintain the path of the menu when a postback event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫事件引發時，以及用來維護功能表導覽路徑。The method is called when the event is raised, and is used to maintain the navigation path of the menu. `eventArgument`參數包含分隔的字串，識別功能表階層中的目前位置的功能表項目。The `eventArgument` parameter contains a delimited string of menu items that identify the current location in the menu hierarchy. 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`關聯的控制項方法。The page passes the value of `eventArgument` to the associated control's method. 相關聯控制項也會轉譯導致回傳發生的標記項目。The associated control also renders the markup element that causes the postback to occur. 如果控制項呈現回傳的用戶端指令碼，從指令碼的引數會傳入`eventArgument`參數。If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回傳因為簡單的 submit`eventArgument`是`null`。If the postback is caused by a simple submit, `eventArgument` is `null`.

exception.span: 目前節點的深度超過允許的深度。

span.span: The depth of the current node is more than allowed.

exception.span: 這可能是由無效的宣告、上次要求後發生的變更，或偽造的 (詐騙的) 要求所造成。

span.span: This can be caused by an invalid declaration, by a change since the last request, or by a forged (spoofed) request.

summary.span: 加入標記屬性，並將控制項開頭標記 (Tag) 的標記 (Markup) 寫入至發出給瀏覽器或裝置的輸出資料流。

span.span: Adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會將標記屬性，並將控制項開頭標記的標記寫入至發出給用戶端瀏覽器的回應資料流輸出資料流。The method adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 物件將會呈現在個別方法和控制項將會關閉，後續呼叫方法。The objects will be rendered individually in the method and the control will be closed with a call to the subsequent method. 覆寫當您想要實作自訂行為。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 比方說，覆寫方法，例如寫入回應資料流內容，任何控制項之前的多個標記`
`。For example, override the method to write multiple tags to the response stream before any control content, such as `
`. 使用方法搭配方法，以確保開頭和結尾標籤在輸出中的一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

summary.span: 以一連串超連結的方式，將關聯 控制項中的關聯功能表項目寫入至輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes the associated menu items in the associated control to the output stream as a series of hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入相關聯的物件輸出資料流為超連結控制項。The method writes the objects of the associated control to the output stream as hyperlinks. 方法從呼叫方法，並用來執行的裝置瀏覽器呈現的標記程式碼的修改。The method is called from the method and is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 在這個階段的生命週期中，並實際標記建立控制項的做法之前，應該設定控制項屬性。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle, and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 在這個階段的生命週期，來控制所做的變更不會儲存檢視狀態。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 儲存控制項所做的變更，覆寫事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event.

exception.span: 目前項目的深度超過允許的深度。

span.span: The depth of the current item is more than allowed.
-or-
The current item is disabled.

summary.span: 將單一功能表項目呈現為超連結。

span.span: Renders a single menu item as a hyperlink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法從呼叫方法來擷取的樣式和間距屬性物件，並將它們套用至新建立的超連結項目。The method is called from the method to retrieve the styles and spacing attributes from the object and apply them to a newly created hyperlink element. 在功能表階層中周遊方法，並將呼叫方法以呈現每個項目。The menu hierarchy is traversed in the method and will call the method to render each item. 每個項目會呈現為超連結和繼承的屬性和指定的樣式控制項。Each item is rendered as a hyperlink and inherits the properties and styles of the specified control. 在網頁上呈現超連結可以是下列其中一項：The hyperlink rendered to the page is one of the following: - 回傳事件，可開啟，或選取的項目。A postback event to open or select the item. - 瀏覽至目標中指定的連結屬性控制項。A link to navigate to the target specified in the property of the control.

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器之後發生的任何配置器私用控制項狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any changes to the adapter private control state that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: ，包含做為 的配置器控制狀態資訊。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用控制狀態，以維持目前的巡覽路徑的功能表。The method uses the control state to maintain the current navigation path of the menu. 當配接器需要維持私人狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 需要跨要求，與相關聯的控制項的狀態分開維護狀態的複雜功能時，配接器可能會維護私用的控制項狀態。An adapter might maintain private control state when there are complex features that need to maintain state across requests, separate from the associated control's state. 配接器需要控制項狀態期間註冊方法呼叫中的每個要求。The adapter needs to register for control state during the method call in every request.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: ，包含傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

span.span: A that contains an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.

summary.span: 可讓 類別處理頁面回傳至伺服器時引發的事件。

span.span: Enables the class to process an event raised when a page is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓類別處理頁面回傳至伺服器時所引發的事件。The method enables the class to process an event that is raised when a page is posted back to the server. 頁面會傳遞`eventArgument`至方法。The page passes `eventArgument` to the method.
